product.title: Mickey and the Beanstalk | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Mickey and the Beanstalk

In Disney’s cute and quirky reprise of the classic Jack & The Beanstalk story, every child’s favorite mouse assumes the modified role of Jack. When a fearsome giant swipes a harp from a castle near Mickey’s home, the mouse goes on an expedition to steal it back and return it to its rightful owner. Along the way, Mickey is seduced into trading his precious cow for three magic beans, and then ultimately enlists the help of sidekicks Donald and Goofy to retrieve the harp and conquer the giant. Young readers will delight in seeing their favorite Disney characters stepping into a classic and beloved storyline.

Tie-in Activity: For a fun and nature-inspired activity, grow your own beanstalk by “planting” potting soil and a lima or pinto bean in a plastic or Styrofoam cup. Puncture holes in the bottom for drainage, set it in a sunny window, and water it every day, then witness its miraculous growth.
